text.name: Beheading
text.desc:
[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [[Sinking]], Clash Power +1
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] If target has 3+ [[Sinking]] Count, Coin Power +1

text.name: Beheading
text.desc:
[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [[Sinking]], Clash Power +1
[WhenUse] <style="highlight">Coin Power +1 for every 3 [[Sinking]] Count on target (max 2)

text.name: Memorial Procession
text.desc:
[WhenUse] If target has 5+ [[Sinking]], Coin Power +1
[EndSkill] If this unit has [NightPathfinding], lose 10 SP

text.name: Memorial Procession
text.desc:
[WhenUse] If target has 5+ [[Sinking]], Coin Power +1
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] At 4+ [[Coffin]], Atk Weight +1
[WhenUse] If this unit has [NightPathfinding], Atk Weight +1
[EndSkill] If this unit has [NightPathfinding], lose 10 SP

text.name: Memorial Procession
text.desc:
[WhenUse] <style="highlight">Coin Power +1 for every 5 [Sinking] on target (max 2)
[WhenUse] <style="highlight">Atk Weight +1 for every 4 [[Coffin]] on self (max 2)
[WhenUse] If this unit has [NightPathfinding], Atk Weight +1
[EndSkill] If this unit has [NightPathfinding], lose 10 SP

text.name: Requiem
text.desc:
[WinDuel] Heal 10 SP
[BeforeUse] If this unit has [NightPathfinding], activate 'Lament, Mourn, and Despair' instead
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 6 [[Sinking]] on target (max 2)
[WhenUse] Deal +7% damage for every [[Coffin]] on self (max 70%)
[WhenUse] Gain 1 [[Coffin]]
[EndSkill] If this Skill attack kills the target, gain 2 [[Coffin]]
coinDescs: [EnemyKill] Inflict ([[Sinking]] on killed target/3) [Sinking] on 2 random enemies (max 3)

text.name: Requiem
text.desc:
[WinDuel] Heal 10 SP
[BeforeUse] If this unit has [NightPathfinding], activate 'Lament, Mourn, and Despair' instead
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for <style="highlight">every 3 [[Sinking]] on target (max <style="highlight">4)
[WhenUse] Deal +12% damage for every [[Coffin]] on self (max 120%)
[WhenUse] Gain 1 [[Coffin]]
[EndSkill] If this Skill attack kills the target, gain 2 [[Coffin]]
coinDescs: [EnemyKill] Inflict ([[Sinking]] on killed target/<style="highlight">2) [Sinking] on 2 random enemies (max <style="highlight">5)

text.name: Lament, Mourn, and Despair
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Lose 15 SP
[WhenUse] Base Power +1 for every 5 [[Sinking]] on target (max 2)
[WhenUse] Deal more damage the further this unit's SP value is from 45 (+0.3% damage for every missing SP, max 21%)
[WhenUse] Deal +7% damage for every [Coffin] on self (max 70%)
[WhenUse] Deal +10% damage for every [NightPathfinding] on self (max 30%)
[WhenUse] Gain 1 [[Coffin]]
[EndSkill] If this Skill attack kills the target, gain 2 [[Coffin]]
[EndSkill] At less than 0 SP, heal 10 SP. When at less than 0 SP, heal more SP the further this unit's SP value is from 0 (heal 1 additional SP for every missing SP; max 25)
[EndBattle] Lose [NightPathfinding]
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Raise the target's Stagger Threshold by 20% of damage dealt
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict Gloom Affinity damage equal to [[Sinking]] on target (max 15)
[EnemyKill] Inflict ([[Sinking]] on killed target/3) [Sinking] on 2 random enemies (max 4)

text.name: Lament, Mourn, and Despair
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Lose 15 SP
[WhenUse] Base Power +1 for every 5 [[Sinking]] on target (max <style="highlight">4)
[WhenUse] Deal more damage the further this unit's SP value is from 45 (+0.3% damage for every missing SP, max 21%)
[WhenUse] Deal +<style="highlight">10% damage for every [Coffin] on self (max <style="highlight">100%)
[WhenUse] Deal +<style="highlight">20% damage for every [NightPathfinding] on self (max <style="highlight">60%)
[WhenUse] Gain <style="highlight">2 [[Coffin]]
[EndSkill] If this Skill attack kills the target, gain <style="highlight">3 [[Coffin]]
[EndSkill] At less than 0 SP, heal 10 SP. When at less than 0 SP, heal more SP the further this unit's SP value is from 0 (heal <style="highlight">2 additional SP for every missing SP; max <style="highlight">50)
[EndBattle] Lose [NightPathfinding]
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Raise the target's Stagger Threshold by <style="highlight">30% of damage dealt
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict Gloom Affinity damage equal to [[Sinking]] on target (max <style="highlight">30)
[EnemyKill] Inflict ([[Sinking]] on killed target/<style="highlight">2) [Sinking] on 2 random enemies (max <style="highlight">8)

text.name: O Dullahan...!
text.desc:
[DuelCounter]
[StartBattle] If this unit does not have [NightPathfinding], gain 1 [NightPathfinding] next turn (once per turn)
[EndBattle] If this unit has [NightPathfinding], lose [NightPathfinding]

[StartBattle] If this unit does not have [NightPathfinding], gain 1 [NightPathfinding] next turn (once per turn)

[EndBattle] If this unit has [NightPathfinding], lose [NightPathfinding]

<style="highlight">[WinDuel] Gain [AttackUp] next turn equal to (# of Clashes/3) (max 3, once per turn)

1071011.name: Call of the Erlking
1071011.desc:
- Deal +1% damage for every 1 [Sinking] on target (max 15%)

<style="highlight">- When, during combat, 1 ally takes damage that would kill them, consume 2 Coffin to apply [WildHunt] to them (once per turn)

- Apply 2 [AttackDmgUp] next turn to the ally with [WildHunt]
- If the said ally is from Wuthering Heights or Edgar Family, apply 1 [Enhancement] next turn as well</style>

1071012.name: Call of the Erlking
1071012.desc:
- Deal +1% damage for every 1 [Sinking] on target (max 15%)

- When, during combat, 1 ally takes damage that would kill them, consume 2 Coffin to apply [WildHunt] to them (<style="highlight">2 times</style> per turn)

- Apply 2 [AttackDmgUp] next turn to the ally with [WildHunt]
- If the said ally is from Wuthering Heights or Edgar Family, apply 1 [Enhancement] next turn as well

1071021.name: Endless Lamentation
1071021.desc:
1 ally with the highest SP deals +5% damage to targets with less than 0 SP
If the target has less than 0 SP: deal even more damage the further the target's SP is from 0 (+0.5% damage per SP, max 20%)
If the target does not have SP, the said ally inflicts +1 more [Sinking] Potency and Count with their Skill and Coin Effects of their Attack Skills (2 times per turn)

1071001.name: Call of the Erlking
1071001.desc: - Deal +1% damage for every 1 [Sinking] on target (max 15%)

1071002.name: Dullahan
1071002.desc:
- Turn Start: if this unit has [NightPathfinding], mount [NightPathfinding].
- Lose 5 SP every time this unit mounts [NightPathfinding]
- If 3+ allies have been defeated in this Encounter, gain [NightPathfinding] next turn. (once per Encounter)
- If this unit gets Staggered due to damage or raised Stagger Threshold when mounting [NightPathfinding], recover from Stagger. If the Stagger is something that cannot be naturally recovered from, this unit does not mount [NightPathfinding].

- Gain 1 Coffin when killing the target.
